amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $4,500,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Army, for procurement of the RI-2200 and RI-2400 Long Arm High-Intensity Arc Metal Halide Handheld Searchlight.

action.text: Amendment SA 2487 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2487 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
